title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw:
This was initially posted on the gazebo issue tracker: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/605

@jpages created an issue
Dear all,
We are migrating the REEM humanoid robot simulation (https://github.com/pal-robotics/reem_simulation) to gazebo 1.5 with ROS Fuerte and Ubuntu 12.04. We have encountered some problems with the simulation of a monocular camera. Concretely, we are using the libgazebo_ros_camera.so plugin to simulate the camera. The 'image' topic is correctly published. However, the 'camera_info' topic is not published. Both topics appear are listed with 'rostopic list', but the 'camera_info' topic does not respond when doing for instance 'rostopic hz <camera_info topic name>'

Can you check if the plugin is working properly?

Thanks in advance

Jordi

Comment 1:
On the other hand, the stereo camera of REEM is properly simulated with the plugin libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so. Nevertheless, some strange error appear from time to time. The stereo camera data are defined to be published in the following topics:
/stereo/left/image
/stereo/left/camera_info
/stereo/right/image
/stereo/right/camera_info
In most cases, when launching gazebo the stereo camera topics are the expected. Nevertheless, in some cases the actual topics are:

/stereo/image
/stereo/camera_info
/stereo/right/image
/stereo/right/camera_info
Due to some reason the topics of the left camera are published in the stereo namespace.
